Ingredients.4: 1 (8 ounce) package shredded sharp Cheddar cheese

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Combine sausage, baking mix, cream cheese, and Cheddar cheese in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the dough hook attachment; beat on low speed until well combined, 2 to 3 minutes.

Directions.3: Roll mixture into 1-inch balls and place on a rimmed baking stone.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until browned and no longer pink in the center, 22 to 25 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
